description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Prepare yourself to fight legions of doodles with only one thought in mind:  destroy.  Go it alone or team up with a friend to control the page and be the greatest thing a pencil has drawn.
